body.p: Tool that generates random data and perform read/writes for Couchbase Server. This is useful for testing your Couchbase node.
The following is the standard command format:

codeblock.codeph:
cbworkloadgen Usage: cbworkloadgen -n host:port -u [username] -p [password]
Options are as follows:
-r [number] // % of workload will be writes, remainder will be reads --ratio-sets=[number] // 95% of workload will be writes, 5% will be reads -i [number] // number of inserted items -l // loop forever until interrupted by user -t // set number of concurrent threads -v // verbose mode
